name: What Am I? (itch) (Plushie Castle)
description:
full screen is recommended

drop a comment if you play this on mobile and it works.

my first twine game. i would like to use twine for my poetry. this was mostly practice with twine and i didn't spend much time on the poem.

Music by Stage for 2 https://tunetank.com/t/4dj3/1106-dreams-of-you/
